Welcome to Eden,
Wayward Stranger
alter
ego
a cyberpunk reverse-isekai rp
the other i
Fifty years ago, a portal to another world opened and allowed passage of otherworldly creatures to cross into ours. Our world was entering a new age of magic; and with it, brought forth new supernatural residents to settle in our world from a mythical place known as Avalon. Our story is set within one of various Special Administrative Zones known as Eden: an artificial city created for humans and fae folk to coexist with one another — but there’s something afoot to threaten the fragile peace and stability within this city.

thread title by username on fri, sep 13 @ 4:14pm
the rotunda
face claim member directory sub groups
The central hub and "heart" of Eden, the Rotunda is an area classified by its core location within the island-city as well as its characteristic circular shape. In the center, sits the city hall and other government buildings which are encompassed by a beautiful, stained glass dome that filters through in natural light dyed in rainbow colors.
It would, however, not prove the last
For soon did the sun bend low, scorching earth and boiling seas
Thus did the second doom break us
